title: dots' junk-drawer
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

//You open the door to your new office in Site-[REDACTED], Office 37.//

//It smells like oil paint and, oddly enough, cinnamon scented candles inside. For some reason, this office has been abandoned, left, forgotten, at the end of the corridor to fester. It doesn't look like no one's been here for ages, rather, it looks clean and orderly. You chalk it up to the janitor just doing their job and remembering to clean the place.//

//The dresser in the corner of the room catches your eye. You approach the forgotten dresser. It's odd and out of place, with splatters of paint and scratches marring it's surface. A large "37" is scratched onto its side.//

//Curious, you pull open the first drawer. A worn drawer, with a couple scratches and nicks. Inside, its littered with random pieces of paper. There's a message scratched onto the bottom of the drawer, "å¤¢". you rifle through them below.//

//The first thing you see is a sticky note on top of all the papers inside.//

> --some-- most of the drawings in here are just too massive to shove in here so you're gonna have to stretch out your little fingers and unwrap them, 'kay? (TRANSLATION: you're gonna have to click on them if you wanna see all the juicy pixels I meant for y'all to see. they look really blurry otherwise)
> 
> -dots.

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3999 fanart (researcher talloran)
" hide="- Close"]]
[[image babygirl.jpg]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-166 fanart 
" hide="- Close"]]
[[image epon_meri]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3999 fanart (again.) 
" hide="- Close"]]
[[image 3999]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-166 coloured sketch
" hide="- Close"]]
[[image 166]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Clef (snakes)
" hide="- Close"]]

//Is... That Dr Clef? Why's "Clerf" written on the back?//

[[image Clerf]]

> sorry, the quality is shit and I can't fix it. 
> 
> -dots

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ KONDRAKI SWARMED BY BUTTERFLIES WHILE TALKING
" hide="- Close"]]
[[image Konny%20boy]]

[DIALOGUE]

> Kondraki :"I can't see shit."

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Mr fish (hatless)
" hide="- Close"]]
[[image i%20stole%20that%20mf%27s%20hat]]

[DIALOGUE]

Mr Fish :"Where the fuck is my hat."

//There's a sticky note on the drawing."

> you guys should read "This is not my hat" mr fish 100% got his hat YOINKED (thats the subliminal storytelling behind this btw)
> 
> - Dots (i think mr fish is a very distinguished gentleman)

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Clef and Mr Fish. [COLOURED] (they're trapped on the same page together)
" hide="- Close"]]

//It's the same drawings from before... but on one piece of paper. And.. they're coloured?//

[[image wet%20from%20my%20tears]]

//It's still wet. It smells like tears and paper.//

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ sketch page (iceberg, fish, clef, 166 and an artistsona doodle on the side.)
" hide="- Close"]]
[[image sketch%20page]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ meri and critters stare at you (very bad and very messy)
" hide="- Close"]]
[[image that%20hare%20is%20possessed]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ feesh
" hide="- Close"]]
[[image Feesh]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ 166 and 507 together
" hide="- Close"]]
[[image ARGH]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ 4999
" hide="- Close"]]
[[image 4999]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ KTE-9927-BLACKCHILD
" hide="- Close"]]
[[image redacted-meri]]

(click on it please i need you to see all the pixels i put my blood sweat n tears into) 

[[/collapsible]]


//Your curiosity satiated, you close the drawer and return to your work, but in the very back crevices of your mind, you can't help but wonder who put the drawer here.//

//...Why does it seem like there's more inside every time you check?//

> [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/fragment:dots-junk-drawer-of-art-1 |Check Again?]]]
author: DrDots
